description: Two weeks after Dr Timnit Gebru was fired from her role in Google, Google’s Ethical AI employees sent CEO Sundar Pichai a list of demands, including organizational changes and a request to reinstate dismissed researcher Timnit Gebru at a higher level.
author: organizejs
addresses: Google, West Bluff Creek Drive, Playa Vista, Los Angeles, Los Angeles County, California, 90094, United States
